faqs.question: What is the typical lock-in period for a shop for rent in Sector 84 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The standard commercial lease agreement in Sector 84 usually includes a mandatory lock-in period typically ranging from 12 to 36 months depending on the size of the unit and the complex developer. This clause prevents the tenant from terminating the lease prematurely providing stability for the property owner and ensuring business continuity in the location. Negotiating the lock-in period depends heavily on the initial deposit amount and the total lease duration so please discuss this specific term with our leasing specialists.

faqs.question: Are there additional maintenance charges or CAM fees when renting a shop
faqs.answer: Yes in most modern commercial complexes in Sector 84 tenants are responsible for Common Area Maintenance or CAM charges in addition to the base rent. These fees cover shared costs such as security lighting HVAC systems in common areas generator backup operation and elevator maintenance. CAM fees vary based on the super area of your rented shop and are typically billed monthly or quarterly. We provide a clear breakdown of estimated CAM charges for every listing.

faqs.question: Can I make structural modifications to the shop interior once I rent the space
faqs.answer: Interior modifications are generally permitted but are strictly subject to approval from the developer or landlord and must comply with local building codes. Major structural changes like wall removal or altering access points are usually prohibited especially in shell-and-core units. Minor changes such as flooring partitions and ceiling installations are typically allowed but require submission of detailed plans to ensure they do not compromise the building’s integrity or services. All changes must be undone upon lease termination unless otherwise agreed.

faqs.question: What is the security deposit required for commercial rentals in this sector
faqs.answer: The standard security deposit for a commercial shop for rent in Sector 84 Gurugram typically ranges from three to six months worth of the agreed-upon rent. This deposit is refundable upon the successful termination of the lease provided all terms and conditions including property condition and rent payments have been met. The exact number of months often depends on the rental duration and the tenant’s financial profile.

faqs.question: Is parking easily available for customers and staff at these commercial centers
faqs.answer: Yes commercial complexes in Sector 84 are designed with ample parking provisions including dedicated basement and surface parking areas for both visitors and commercial unit staff. Sufficient parking is a key amenity ensuring easy accessibility which directly contributes to higher customer footfall. Specific details regarding dedicated staff parking allowances will be included in your lease agreement.
